name: "A Thousand Texts in the Central Hub"
description: This large bookshelf can be seen in the Duke's office, neatly arranged with numerous volumes of organized case files. All written information within the Fortress of Meropide is encompassed within the dossiers on these bookshelves. As some guards have remarked, only the word "vast" can accurately summarize the quantity of information contained within, and to go through them all is no mean feat. However, if one wishes to master Fortress affairs, this is the place to start...
